metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18216 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In fs/ocfs2/cluster/nodemanager.c in the Linux kernel before 4.15, local users can cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and BUG) because a required mutex is not used. It was discovered that a NULL pointer dereference could be triggered in the OCFS2 file system implementation in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:
